news.title: Meta signs deals with three nuclear companies for 6-plus GW of power
news.summary: Two smaller companies, Oklo and TerraPower, along with Vistra, a large energy company, just signed agreements with Meta.

news.title: X restricts Grok’s image generation to paying subscribers only after drawing the world’s ire
news.summary: Elon Musk's AI company has restricted Grok's controversial AI image-generation feature to only paying subscribers on X, after the tool invited heated criticism from across the world for letting users generate sexualized images of women and children.

news.title: The venture firm that ate Silicon Valley just raised another $15 billion
news.summary: In a blog post published Friday morning, Ben Horowitz writes that "as the American leader in Venture Capital, the fate of new technology in the United States rests partly on our shoulders." It's the kind of statement certain to cause agita at rival firms.

news.title: Anthropic adds Allianz to growing list of enterprise wins
news.summary: Anthropic announces its first enterprise deal of 2026, which includes building agents for, and giving Claude code to, Allianz.

news.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
news.summary: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press conferences from the likes of Nvidia, Sony, and AMD and previews from Sunday’s Unveiled event.

news.title: Black Mirror has been renewed for another season
news.summary: In an interview with Netflix's Tudum, Black Mirror creator Charlie Brooker announced today that the sci-fi anthology series will be returning for an eighth season. news.title: I can’t find the Trump phone at America’s largest tech show
news.summary: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump phone's whereabouts. news.title: I’ve tested the latest Switch 2 controllers, and this one is the best
news.summary: If you choose to get an extra controller for your Nintendo Switch 2, you can spend a lot — and get a lot in return. news.summary: It may have been one of the smallest devices announced at CES 2026, but Lego's new Smart Brick was also one of the most talked about debuts of the show. news.title: NASA chief reviews Orion heat shield, expresses “full confidence” in it for Artemis II
news.summary: "That level of openness and transparency is exactly what should be expected of NASA."

news.title: These 60,000-year-old poison arrows are oldest yet found
news.summary: Hunter-gatherers probably derived the poison from the milky bulb extract of a Boophone disticha plant.

news.title: X’s half-assed attempt to paywall Grok doesn’t block free image editing
news.summary: Faced with a ban in the United Kingdom, X pushes flawed fix to CSAM problem.

news.title: “Ungentrified” Craigslist may be the last real place on the Internet
news.summary: People still use Craigslist to find jobs, love, and even to cast creative projects.

news.title: Silicon Valley Billionaires Panic Over California’s Proposed Wealth Tax
news.summary: Larry Page’s apparent Florida move highlights how seriously the ultra-rich are taking a one-time tax aimed at extreme wealth inequality.

news.title: X Didn’t Fix Grok's ‘Undressing’ Problem. It Just Makes People Pay for It
news.summary: X is allowing only “verified” users to create images with Grok. Experts say it represents the “monetization of abuse”—and anyone can still generate images on Grok’s app and website.

news.title: Conservative Lawmakers Want Porn Taxes. Critics Say They’re Unconstitutional
news.summary: Alabama passed a 10 percent porn tax last year, as Utah and Pennsylvania eye similar bills. Half the country has enacted age-verification laws to prevent minors from viewing porn.
